oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Abstract for articles received from officers, Battery H, 1st Ill. Light Artillery
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Abstract for articles received from officers, Battery H, 1st Illinois Light Artillery, USA, for September 1863. Abstracts were inventory forms listing the equipment of a unit that commanders had to fill out and turn in to army quartermasters. The item is signed by 2nd Lt. Francis DeGress.
